mapper.sql:
FROM item a JOIN itemImgUpload b on a.itemSeq = b.itemSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.itemSaleNY = 0 AND b.sort = 1
AND a.itemHeader LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
ORDER BY a.itemRegDatetime ASC
mapper.select: SELECT a.itemSeq ,a.itemHeader ,a.itemPrice ,a.itemDescription ,a.itemPlace ,b.path ,b.uuidName ,(select b.memberName from member b where a.member_seq = b.seq) as seller from item a JOIN itemImgUpload b on a.itemSeq = b.itemSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.itemSeq = #{mainKey} AND b.sort = 1
SELECT a.uuidName ,a.path FROM itemImgUpload a WHERE 1=1 AND a.itemSeq = #{mainKey} AND a.sort != 1
SELECT a.itemSeq, a.itemHeader, a.itemPrice, b.path, b.uuidName FROM item a JOIN itemImgUpload b on a.itemSeq = b.itemSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.itemSaleNY = 0 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(memberID) FROM member WHERE memberID = #{memberID}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO item ( itemHeader ,itemPrice ,itemDescription ,itemPlace ,itemRegDatetime ,itemModDatetime ,itemLikeNY ,itemDelNY ,itemSaleNY ,member_seq ) VALUES ( #{itemHeader} ,#{itemPrice} ,#{itemDescription} ,(select a.memberPlace from member a where a.Seq = #{seq}) ,now() ,now() ,0 ,0 ,0 ,#{seq} )
SELECT last_insert_id()
